# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (Position: x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace (Position: x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (Position: x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (Position: x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (Position: x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (Position: x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (Position: x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (Position: x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (Position: x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (Position: x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Electricity generation structure at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity group (Position: x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt structure at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (Position: x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (Position: x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (Position: x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment without fuel
- Ensure that the burner equipment has fuel before using it.
### Errors when using stone furnace without ingredients
- Ensure that the stone furnace has the required ingredients before using it.
### Errors when using offshore pump without connection to boiler
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a boiler before using it.
### Errors when using steam engine without connection to electricity network
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to an electricity network before using it.
### Errors when using belt group without items to transport
- Ensure that the belt group has items to transport before using it.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the given execution logs.
